text: Cliff Simon (7 September 1962 â€“ 9 March 2021) was a South African athlete and actor. He was best known for his role as Ba'al in Stargate SG-1. He was killed in a kiteboarding accident in Topanga, California, on 9 March 2021, aged 58. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2021 deaths Category:South African actors Category:Deaths in sport
title: Cliff Simon
